column2: df.impActivities <- df.raw %>% select(Q2.3, grep("Q7.4", names(df.raw))) %>% gather(statement, response, 2:7) %>% group_by(Q2.3, statement)
# How often ONLINE vs OFFLINE activities
df.onOffActivities <- df.raw %>% select(Q2.3, grep("Q7.5", names(df.raw))) %>% gather(statement, response, 2:13)
plot.on_yes <- ggplot(df.onOffActivities %>% filter(online == 1, Q2.3 == "Yes"), mapping = aes(x = factor(statement))) +
plot.on_no <- ggplot(df.onOffActivities %>% filter(online == 1, Q2.3 == "No"), mapping = aes(x = factor(statement))) +
plot.off_yes <- ggplot(df.onOffActivities %>% filter(online == 0, Q2.3 == "Yes"), mapping = aes(x = factor(statement))) +
plot.off_no <- ggplot(df.onOffActivities %>% filter(online == 0, Q2.3 == "No"), mapping = aes(x = factor(statement))) +
ggarrange(plot.on_yes, plot.on_no, plot.off_yes, plot.off_no, nrow = 2, ncol = 2, common.legend = TRUE, legend = "right")
